Symbol.Script_3D:
if show_el<1 then end IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 ENDIF duct_show = not(show_axis) IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN END
res = 24 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN res = 8 ! Simple
CALL "MEP_m_RequestSystemGlobals" PARAMETERS ALL returned_parameters gs_cont_pen, sMat, gs_InsMat if show_axis then MEP_cline_pen = gs_cont_pen PEN gs_cont_pen RESOL res
IF useSysMat AND MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] <> "0" THEN gs_DuctMat = sMat
ENDIF
XFORM MEP_Position[2][1], MEP_Position[3][1], dZx, MEP_Position[1][1], MEP_Position[2][2], MEP_Position[3][2], dZy, MEP_Position[1][2], MEP_Position[2][3], MEP_Position[3][3], dZz, MEP_Position[1][3]
HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds = 30000
hceID_1 = HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds+100 hceID_2 = HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds+200 hceID_3 = HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds+300
HOTSPOT ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1, hceID_1 HOTSPOT ConPosX_2+ConLength_2*COS(ConAngle_2), ConPosY_2+ConLength_2*SIN(ConAngle_2), ConPosZ_2, hceID_2 HOTSPOT ConPosX_3+ConLength_3*COS(ConAngle_3), ConPosY_3+ConLength_3*(-SIN(ConAngle_3)), ConPosZ_3, hceID_3
operatedMode = 0 addStatus = 0 IF GLOB_CONTEXT > 40 AND GLOB_CONTEXT < 50 THEN operatedMode = 1 addStatus = 8 ENDIF
dd = ConThroatLength_2+ConThroatLength_3+MEP_NumConnectionData[1][12] r2 = ConThroatLength_2+MEP_NumConnectionData[2][12] r3 = ConThroatLength_3+MEP_NumConnectionData[3][12] xx = (dd^2-r3^2+r2^2)/(2*dd) yy = SQR(r2^2-xx^2) xx = xx-ConThroatLength_2-MEP_NumConnectionData[1][12]/2
ConThroatLength_2 = ConThroatLength_2 - MEP_NumConnectionData[1][14] ConThroatLength_3 = ConThroatLength_3 - MEP_NumConnectionData[1][14]
IF duct_show THEN MATERIAL gs_DuctMat
ADDz -ductHalfHeight PRISM_ 9, ductHalfHeight*2, 0, ductHalfWidthA, 79, 0, ductHalfWidthA+ConThroatLength_2, 915, ConThroatLength_2*SIN(ConAngle_2), ductHalfWidthA+ConThroatLength_2-ConThroatLength_2*COS(ConAngle_2), 3007+addStatus, (ConThroatLength_2+ductHalfWidthB*2)*SIN(ConAngle_2), ductHalfWidthA+ConThroatLength_2-(ConThroatLength_2+ductHalfWidthB*2)*COS(ConAngle_2), 79, yy, -xx, 3079, 0, -ductHalfWidthA-ConThroatLength_3, 915, (ConThroatLength_3+ductHalfWidthC*2)*SIN(ConAngle_3), -ductHalfWidthA-ConThroatLength_3+(ConThroatLength_3+ductHalfWidthC*2)*COS(ConAngle_3), 3007+addStatus, ConThroatLength_3*SIN(ConAngle_3), -ductHalfWidthA-ConThroatLength_3+ConThroatLength_3*COS(ConAngle_3), 79, 0, -ductHalfWidthA, 3007+addStatus DEL 1
halfHeight = ductHalfHeight halfHeightC = connectorHalfHeight
IF flangeA THEN length = connectorLengthA halfWidth = ductHalfWidthA halfWidthC = connectorHalfWidthA
GOSUB 10 ENDIF IF flangeB THEN length = connectorLengthB halfWidth = ductHalfWidthB halfWidthC = connectorHalfWidthB
ADD ConPosX_2+ConLength_2*COS(ConAngle_2), ConPosY_2+ConLength_2*SIN(ConAngle_2), ConPosZ_2 ROTz -(180-ConAngle_2) GOSUB 10 DEL 2 ENDIF IF flangeC THEN length = connectorLengthC halfWidth = ductHalfWidthC halfWidthC = connectorHalfWidthC
ADD ConPosX_3+ConLength_3*COS(ConAngle_3), ConPosY_3+ConLength_3*(-SIN(ConAngle_3)), ConPosZ_3 ROTz 180-ConAngle_3 GOSUB 10 DEL 2 ENDIF ENDIF
IF ((MEP_cline_show and show_axis_and) or show_axis) AND operatedMode < EPS THEN ! -----> center line <----- ! MODEL WIRE ADDy ductHalfWidthA+ConThroatLength_2 MULy -1 ROTz 90-ConAngle_2 ARC ConThroatLength_2+ductHalfWidthB, 0, ConAngle_2 DEL 3
ADDy -ductHalfWidthA-ConThroatLength_3 ROTz 90-ConAngle_3 ARC ConThroatLength_3+ductHalfWidthC, 0, ConAngle_3 DEL 2 MODEL SOLID ENDIF
IF MEP_InsShow and show_isol and not(show_axis) THEN MATERIAL gs_InsMat
ductHalfWidthA = ductHalfWidthA+MEP_InsThickness ductHalfHeight = ductHalfHeight+MEP_InsThickness ductHalfWidthB = ductHalfWidthB+MEP_InsThickness ductHalfWidthC = ductHalfWidthC+MEP_InsThickness
r2 = r2+MEP_InsThickness r3 = r3+MEP_InsThickness xx = (dd^2-r3^2+r2^2)/(2*dd) yy = SQR(r2^2-xx^2) xx = xx-ConThroatLength_2-MEP_NumConnectionData[1][12]/2
ConThroatLength_2 = ConThroatLength_2 - MEP_InsThickness ConThroatLength_3 = ConThroatLength_3 - MEP_InsThickness
ADDz -ductHalfHeight PRISM_ 9, ductHalfHeight*2, 0, ductHalfWidthA, 79, 0, ductHalfWidthA+ConThroatLength_2, 915, ConThroatLength_2*SIN(ConAngle_2), ductHalfWidthA+ConThroatLength_2-ConThroatLength_2*COS(ConAngle_2), 3007+addStatus, (ConThroatLength_2+ductHalfWidthB*2)*SIN(ConAngle_2), ductHalfWidthA+ConThroatLength_2-(ConThroatLength_2+ductHalfWidthB*2)*COS(ConAngle_2), 79, yy, -xx, 3079, 0, -ductHalfWidthA-ConThroatLength_3, 915, (ConThroatLength_3+ductHalfWidthC*2)*SIN(ConAngle_3), -ductHalfWidthA-ConThroatLength_3+(ConThroatLength_3+ductHalfWidthC*2)*COS(ConAngle_3), 3007+addStatus, ConThroatLength_3*SIN(ConAngle_3), -ductHalfWidthA-ConThroatLength_3+ConThroatLength_3*COS(ConAngle_3), 79, 0, -ductHalfWidthA, 3007+addStatus DEL 1 ENDIF DEL 1
END
10: ROTy 90 PRISM_ 10, length, halfHeightC, halfWidthC, 15, -halfHeightC, halfWidthC, 15, -halfHeightC, -halfWidthC, 15, halfHeightC, -halfWidthC, 15, halfHeightC, halfWidthC, -1, halfHeight, halfWidth, 15, -halfHeight, halfWidth, 15, -halfHeight, -halfWidth, 15, halfHeight, -halfWidth, 15, halfHeight, halfWidth, -1 DEL 1 RETURN
Symbol.Script_2D:
if show_el<1 then end CALL "MEP_m_RequestSystemGlobals" PARAMETERS ALL returned_parameters gs_cont_pen, gs_fill_type, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, MEP_cline_type, MEP_cline_pen if show_axis then MEP_cline_pen = gs_cont_pen PEN gs_cont_pen SET FILL gs_fill_type
HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds = 30000
hceID_1 = HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds+100 hceID_2 = HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds+200 hceID_3 = HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds+300
ADD2 MEP_Position[1][1], MEP_Position[1][2] HOTSPOT2 outCoords[1][1], outCoords[1][2], hceID_1 HOTSPOT2 outCoords[4][1], outCoords[4][2], hceID_2 HOTSPOT2 outCoords[7][1], outCoords[7][2], hceID_3 DEL 1
IF ABS(dZx) < EPS AND ABS(dZy) < EPS THEN dx = MEP_Position[2][1] dy = MEP_Position[2][2]
length = SQR(dx^2+dy^2) IF ABS(length-1) > EPS THEN dx = dx/length dy = dy/length ENDIF
arCosVal = dx/1 IF ABS(arCosVal) > 1 AND SGN(arCosVal) = -1 THEN arCosVal = -1 IF ABS(arCosVal) > 1 AND SGN(arCosVal) = 1 THEN arCosVal = 1 dirAngOnXYPlane = ACS(arCosVal) IF SGN(dy) = -1 THEN dirAngOnXYPlane = 360-dirAngOnXYPlane
dd = ConThroatLength_2+ConThroatLength_3+MEP_NumConnectionData[1][12] r2 = ConThroatLength_2+MEP_NumConnectionData[2][12] r3 = ConThroatLength_3+MEP_NumConnectionData[3][12] xx = (dd^2-r3^2+r2^2)/(2*dd) yy = SQR(r2^2-xx^2) xx = xx-ConThroatLength_2-MEP_NumConnectionData[1][12]/2
ConThroatLength_2 = ConThroatLength_2 - MEP_NumConnectionData[1][14] ConThroatLength_3 = ConThroatLength_3 - MEP_NumConnectionData[1][14]
ADD2 MEP_Position[1][1], MEP_Position[1][2] ROT2 dirAngOnXYPlane MUL2 1, 1-2*(SGN(dZz) = -1)
if not(show_axis) then PUT 0, ductHalfWidthA, 1 PUT 0, ductHalfWidthA+ConThroatLength_2, 901 PUT ConThroatLength_2*SIN(ConAngle_2), ductHalfWidthA+ConThroatLength_2-ConThroatLength_2*COS(ConAngle_2), 3001 PUT (ConThroatLength_2+ductHalfWidthB*2)*SIN(ConAngle_2), ductHalfWidthA+ConThroatLength_2-(ConThroatLength_2+ductHalfWidthB*2)*COS(ConAngle_2), 1 PUT yy, -xx, 3001 PUT 0, -ductHalfWidthA-ConThroatLength_3, 901 PUT (ConThroatLength_3+ductHalfWidthC*2)*SIN(ConAngle_3), -ductHalfWidthA-ConThroatLength_3+(ConThroatLength_3+ductHalfWidthC*2)*COS(ConAngle_3), 3001 PUT ConThroatLength_3*SIN(ConAngle_3), -ductHalfWidthA-ConThroatLength_3+ConThroatLength_3*COS(ConAngle_3), 1 PUT 0, -ductHalfWidthA, 3001
POLY2_B NSP/3, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen,
GET (NSP) endif IF flangeA and not(show_axis) THEN length = connectorLengthA halfWidthC = connectorHalfWidthA
GOSUB 10 ENDIF IF flangeB and not(show_axis) THEN length = connectorLengthB halfWidthC = connectorHalfWidthB
ADD2 ConPosX_2+ConLength_2*COS(ConAngle_2), ConPosY_2+ConLength_2*SIN(ConAngle_2) ROT2 -(180-ConAngle_2) GOSUB 10 DEL 2 ENDIF
IF flangeC and not(show_axis) THEN length = connectorLengthC halfWidthC = connectorHalfWidthC
ADD2 ConPosX_3+ConLength_3*COS(ConAngle_3), ConPosY_3+ConLength_3*(-SIN(ConAngle_3)) ROT2 180-ConAngle_3 GOSUB 10 DEL 2 ENDIF
IF MEP_InsShow and show_isol and not(show_axis) THEN ductHalfWidthA = ductHalfWidthA+MEP_InsThickness ductHalfHeight = ductHalfHeight+MEP_InsThickness ductHalfWidthB = ductHalfWidthB+MEP_InsThickness ductHalfWidthC = ductHalfWidthC+MEP_InsThickness
r2 = r2+MEP_InsThickness r3 = r3+MEP_InsThickness xx = (dd^2-r3^2+r2^2)/(2*dd) yy = SQR(r2^2-xx^2) xx = xx-ConThroatLength_2-MEP_NumConnectionData[1][12]/2
ConThroatLength_2 = ConThroatLength_2 - MEP_InsThickness ConThroatLength_3 = ConThroatLength_3 - MEP_InsThickness
PUT 0, ductHalfWidthA, 1 PUT 0, ductHalfWidthA+ConThroatLength_2, 901 PUT ConThroatLength_2*SIN(ConAngle_2), ductHalfWidthA+ConThroatLength_2-ConThroatLength_2*COS(ConAngle_2), 3000 PUT (ConThroatLength_2+ductHalfWidthB*2)*SIN(ConAngle_2), ductHalfWidthA+ConThroatLength_2-(ConThroatLength_2+ductHalfWidthB*2)*COS(ConAngle_2), 1 PUT yy, -xx, 3001 PUT 0, -ductHalfWidthA-ConThroatLength_3, 901 PUT (ConThroatLength_3+ductHalfWidthC*2)*SIN(ConAngle_3), -ductHalfWidthA-ConThroatLength_3+(ConThroatLength_3+ductHalfWidthC*2)*COS(ConAngle_3), 3000 PUT ConThroatLength_3*SIN(ConAngle_3), -ductHalfWidthA-ConThroatLength_3+ConThroatLength_3*COS(ConAngle_3), 1 PUT 0, -ductHalfWidthA, 3001
POLY2_ NSP/3, 1,
GET (NSP)
ENDIF
DEL 3 ELSE IF gs_fill_pen THEN PEN gs_fill_pen if not(show_axis) then PROJECT2{3} 3, 270, 3+32, 4, gs_back_pen, 0, 0, 0, PARAMETERS duct_show = 1, MEP_InsShow = 0, gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2
PEN gs_cont_pen if not(show_axis) then PROJECT2{3} 3, 270, 2+32, 2+8, 0, 0, 0, 0, PARAMETERS duct_show = 1, MEP_InsShow = 0, gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2
IF MEP_InsShow and show_isol and not(show_axis) THEN PROJECT2{3} 3, 270, 2+32, 8, 0, 0, 0, 0, PARAMETERS duct_show = 0, MEP_InsShow = 1, MEP_cline_show_3D = 0, gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2
IF ((MEP_cline_show and show_axis_and) or show_axis) THEN ! -----> center line <----- ! PEN MEP_cline_pen SET LINE_TYPE MEP_cline_type
PROJECT2{3} 3, 270, 3+32, 8, 0, 0, 0, 0, PARAMETERS duct_show = 0, MEP_InsShow = 0, gs_detlevel_3D = `Detailed` ENDIF DEL TOP ENDIF
END
10: PUT 0, halfWidthC, 1 PUT 0, -halfWidthC, 1 PUT length, -halfWidthC, 1 PUT length, halfWidthC, 1 PUT 0, halfWidthC, -1
POLY2_B NSP/3, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen,
GET (NSP) RETURN
Symbol.Script_1D:
success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_axis", show_axis) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_axis_and", show_axis_and) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_isol", show_isol) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_conventions", show_conventions) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_size", show_size) call "Показ_систем" PARAMETERS All RETURNED_PARAMETERS show_el, syst_name
EPS = 0.00001
ductInnerWidthA = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][12] ductHalfWidthA = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][12]/2+MEP_NumConnectionData[1][14] ductHalfHeight = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][13]/2+MEP_NumConnectionData[1][14] connectorLengthA = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][14] connectorHalfWidthA = ductHalfWidthA+MEP_NumConnectionData[1][15] connectorHalfHeight = ductHalfHeight+MEP_NumConnectionData[1][15] connectedA = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][18]
ductHalfWidthB = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][12]/2+MEP_NumConnectionData[1][14] connectorLengthB = connectorLengthA connectorHalfWidthB = ductHalfWidthB+MEP_NumConnectionData[2][15] connectedB = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][18]
ductHalfWidthC = MEP_NumConnectionData[3][12]/2+MEP_NumConnectionData[1][14] connectorLengthC = connectorLengthA connectorHalfWidthC = ductHalfWidthC+MEP_NumConnectionData[3][15] connectedC = MEP_NumConnectionData[3][18]
flangeA = 1 IF MEP_NumConnectionData[1][15] < EPS OR ABS(gs_AddConnections[1][1] - 1) < EPS THEN flangeA = 0
flangeB = 1 IF MEP_NumConnectionData[2][15] < EPS OR ABS(gs_AddConnections[2][1] - 1) < EPS THEN flangeB = 0
flangeC = 1 IF MEP_NumConnectionData[3][15] < EPS OR ABS(gs_AddConnections[3][1] - 1) < EPS THEN flangeC = 0
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ConWidth_2" AND ConWidth_3+ConWidth_2 < ConWidth_1 THEN ConWidth_3 = ConWidth_1-ConWidth_2 PARAMETERS ConWidth_3 = ConWidth_3 ENDIF IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ConWidth_3" AND ConWidth_3+ConWidth_2 < ConWidth_1 THEN ConWidth_2 = ConWidth_1-ConWidth_3 PARAMETERS ConWidth_2 = ConWidth_2 ENDIF IF ConWidth_3+ConWidth_2 < ConWidth_1 THEN ConWidth_2 = ConWidth_1/2 PARAMETERS ConWidth_2 = ConWidth_2 ConWidth_3 = ConWidth_1/2 PARAMETERS ConWidth_3 = ConWidth_3 ENDIF
IF useSysMat AND MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] <> "0" THEN LOCK "gs_DuctMat", "gs_InsMat"
IF MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] = "0" THEN LOCK "useSysMat"
! ---------------- ! ! --- Z vector --- ! ! ---------------- !
dZx = -MEP_Position[3][2]*MEP_Position[2][3]+MEP_Position[3][3]*MEP_Position[2][2] dZy = -MEP_Position[3][3]*MEP_Position[2][1]+MEP_Position[3][1]*MEP_Position[2][3] dZz = -MEP_Position[3][1]*MEP_Position[2][2]+MEP_Position[3][2]*MEP_Position[2][1]
!!! +++ Transformational Matrix +++ !!!
DIM tMatrix[3][3]
tMatrix[1][1] = MEP_Position[2][1] tMatrix[1][2] = MEP_Position[2][2] tMatrix[1][3] = MEP_Position[2][3]
tMatrix[2][1] = MEP_Position[3][1] tMatrix[2][2] = MEP_Position[3][2] tMatrix[2][3] = MEP_Position[3][3]
tMatrix[3][1] = dZx tMatrix[3][2] = dZy tMatrix[3][3] = dZz
!!! +++ Input Coordinates +++ !!!
PUT ConPosX_1-ConLength_1, ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1 PUT gs_Connections[1][4], gs_Connections[1][5], gs_Connections[1][6] PUT gs_Connections[1][7], gs_Connections[1][8], gs_Connections[1][9]
PUT ConPosX_2+ConLength_2*COS(ConAngle_2), ConPosY_2+ConLength_2*SIN(ConAngle_2), ConPosZ_2 PUT gs_Connections[2][4], gs_Connections[2][5], gs_Connections[2][6] PUT gs_Connections[2][7], gs_Connections[2][8], gs_Connections[2][9]
PUT ConPosX_3+ConLength_3*COS(ConAngle_3), ConPosY_3+ConLength_3*(-SIN(ConAngle_3)), ConPosZ_3 PUT gs_Connections[3][4], gs_Connections[3][5], gs_Connections[3][6] PUT gs_Connections[3][7], gs_Connections[3][8], gs_Connections[3][9]
Coordinates = NSP/3
DIM inCoords[20][3]
FOR cnum = 1 TO Coordinates inCoords[cnum][1] = GET(1) inCoords[cnum][2] = GET(1) inCoords[cnum][3] = GET(1) NEXT cnum
! --- the Matrix Operation, what make the Output-Coordinates
DIM outCoords[20][3]
FOR cnum = 1 TO Coordinates outCoords[cnum][1] = inCoords[cnum][1]*tMatrix[1][1]+inCoords[cnum][2]*tMatrix[2][1]+inCoords[cnum][3]*tMatrix[3][1] outCoords[cnum][2] = inCoords[cnum][1]*tMatrix[1][2]+inCoords[cnum][2]*tMatrix[2][2]+inCoords[cnum][3]*tMatrix[3][2] outCoords[cnum][3] = inCoords[cnum][1]*tMatrix[1][3]+inCoords[cnum][2]*tMatrix[2][3]+inCoords[cnum][3]*tMatrix[3][3] NEXT cnum
z = 0 FOR i = 0 TO MEP_NumberConnections-1 z = z + outCoords[1+3*i][3] NEXT i
z = MEP_Position[1][3] + z/MEP_NumberConnections
PARAMETERS ac_toplevel = z PARAMETERS ac_bottomlevel = z
Symbol.Script_UI:
UI_DIALOG `Специальные Параметры MEP`
DIM ui_set_str[6][2] ui_set_str[1][1] = "(A) "+`Угол Патрубка 1` ui_set_str[2][1] = "(B) "+`Длина Перехвата Патрубка 1` ui_set_str[3][1] = "(C) "+`Угол Патрубка 2` ui_set_str[4][1] = "(D) "+`Длина Перехвата Патрубка 2` ui_set_str[5][1] = `Изоляция` ui_set_str[6][1] = `Толщина`
ui_set_str[1][2] = "ConAngle_2" ui_set_str[2][2] = "ConThroatLength_2" ui_set_str[3][2] = "ConAngle_3" ui_set_str[4][2] = "ConThroatLength_3" ui_set_str[5][2] = "MEP_InsShow" ui_set_str[6][2] = "MEP_InsThickness"
DIM ui_set_attr[7][9] FOR i = 2 TO 7 FOR j = 1 TO 9 ui_set_attr[i][j] = 0 NEXT j NEXT i ui_set_attr[1][1] = 1 ui_set_attr[1][2] = 3 ui_set_attr[1][3] = 220 ui_set_attr[1][4] = 50 ui_set_attr[1][5] = 127 ui_set_attr[1][6] = 90 ui_set_attr[1][7] = 15 ui_set_attr[1][8] = 128 ui_set_attr[1][9] = 23
ui_set_attr[6][3] = 1
DIM ui_vis_attr[6][5] FOR i = 1 TO 6 FOR j = 1 TO 5 ui_vis_attr[i][j] = 0 NEXT j NEXT i ui_vis_attr[1][1] = 4 ui_vis_attr[1][2] = 1 ui_vis_attr[1][3] = 6 ui_vis_attr[1][4] = 3 ui_vis_attr[1][5] = 4
ui_vis_attr[2][1] = 1 ui_vis_attr[2][2] = 237 ui_vis_attr[2][3] = 68 ui_vis_attr[2][4] = 14
DIM ui_con_type[3] ui_con_type[1] = 1 ui_con_type[2] = 1 ui_con_type[3] = 1
IF useSysMat AND MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] <> "0" THEN ui_vis_attr[5][2] = 4 ui_vis_attr[6][2] = 4 ELSE ui_vis_attr[5][2] = 0 IF MEP_InsShow THEN ui_vis_attr[6][2] = 0 ELSE ui_vis_attr[6][2] = 4 ENDIF ENDIF
IF MEP_InsShow THEN ui_set_attr[7][2] = 0 ELSE ui_set_attr[7][2] = 4 ENDIF
IF MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] = "0" THEN ui_vis_attr[4][2] = 4 ELSE ui_vis_attr[4][2] = 0 ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS ALL ui_set_str = ui_set_str, ui_set_attr = ui_set_attr, ui_vis_attr = ui_vis_attr, ui_centerline_vars = 0, ui_con_type = ui_con_type, ui_system_var_pos = 1
setPage = 1 ui_cur_page = 0 FOR j = 1 TO VARDIM1(ui_page_idx) IF ui_page_idx[j] = setPage THEN ui_cur_page = j NEXT j
IF ABS(gs_ui_current_page - ui_cur_page) < EPS THEN UI_PAGE gs_ui_current_page
UI_PICT 1, 25, 45, 156, 200, 1 ENDIF
Symbol.Script_VL:
! Duct Radius Splitter ! Zsolt Feke/2007
call "FM_types_MEP" parameters
DIM shape_typ_to_validation[3] shape_typ_to_validation[1] = 1 ! Rectangle shape_typ_to_validation[2] = 0 ! Circle shape_typ_to_validation[3] = 0 ! Oval
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_detlevel_3D" OR gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_3D_m ELSE IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Детальный` PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D = gs_detlevel_3D ENDIF
VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D" `Детальный`,`Простой`,`Откл.` VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D_m" 2, 1, 0
VALUES "MEP_InsThickness" RANGE(0, ] VALUES "ConThroatLength_2" RANGE (ConWallThickness_1, ] VALUES "ConThroatLength_3" RANGE (ConWallThickness_1, ] VALUES "ConAngle_2" RANGE (0, 90] VALUES "ConAngle_3" RANGE (0, 90]
gs_ui = 1
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
PARAMETERS MEP_NumberConnections = 3
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ConDepth_1" THEN ConDepth_2 = ConDepth_1 PARAMETERS ConDepth_2 = ConDepth_2 ConDepth_3 = ConDepth_1 PARAMETERS ConDepth_3 = ConDepth_3 ENDIF
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ConDepth_2" THEN ConDepth_1 = ConDepth_3 PARAMETERS ConDepth_1 = ConDepth_1 ConDepth_3 = ConDepth_2 PARAMETERS ConDepth_3 = ConDepth_3 ENDIF
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ConDepth_3" THEN ConDepth_1 = ConDepth_2 PARAMETERS ConDepth_1 = ConDepth_1 ConDepth_2 = ConDepth_3 PARAMETERS ConDepth_2 = ConDepth_2 ENDIF
! --- 1st CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 1 ConName = `Основное 1`
ConDVecX = -1 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = 0 ConWVecY = -1 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(setProgram) THEN IF ConDepth_1 < EPS THEN ConDepth_1 = 0.001 PARAMETERS ConDepth_1 = ConDepth_1 ENDIF VALUES "ConDepth_1" RANGE (0,]
isConLength = 1 IF ABS(gs_AddConnections[1][1] - 1) < EPS THEN isConLength = 0 ConLength_1 = ConWallThickness_1*isConLength PARAMETERS ConLength_1 = ConLength_1 ConPosX_1 = ConLength_1 PARAMETERS ConPosX_1 = ConPosX_1 PARAMETERS ConPosY_1 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_1 = 0 ELSE IF ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[2][12] - ConWidth_2) > EPS THEN MEP_NumConnectionData[1][12] = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][12]+0.001 PARAMETERS MEP_NumConnectionData[1][12] = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][12] ENDIF IF ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[3][12] - ConWidth_3) > EPS THEN MEP_NumConnectionData[1][12] = MEP_NumConnectionData[3][12]+0.001 PARAMETERS MEP_NumConnectionData[1][12] = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][12] ENDIF ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_1, ConPosY = ConPosY_1, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_1, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_1, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_1, ConWidth = ConWidth_1, ConDepth = ConDepth_1, ConLength = ConLength_1, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_1, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_1, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_1, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_1, ConToolType = ConToolType_1, ConStatus = ConStatus_1, ConType_1 = ConType_1, ConConnectorType_1 = ConConnectorType_1, ConSystem_1 = ConSystem_1, MEP_bEnableInsulation = 1, MEP_InsShow = MEP_InsShow, gs_ui = gs_ui, ui_page_idx = ui_page_idx, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[1][1] = STR(ConToolType_1, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[1][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[1][3] = "0"
! --- 2nd CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 2 ConName = `Патрубок 1`
ConDVecX = COS(ConAngle_2) ConDVecY = SIN(ConAngle_2) ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = -SIN(ConAngle_2) ConWVecY = COS(ConAngle_2) ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(setProgram) THEN VALUES "ConWidth_2" RANGE (ConWidth_1-ConWidth_3, ConWidth_1)
isConLength = 1 IF ABS(gs_AddConnections[2][1] - 1) < EPS THEN isConLength = 0 ConLength_2 = ConWallThickness_1*isConLength PARAMETERS ConLength_2 = ConLength_2 ConPosX_2 = (ConThroatLength_2+ConWidth_2/2)*SIN(ConAngle_2)-ConLength_2*ConDVecX PARAMETERS ConPosX_2 = ConPosX_2 ConPosY_2 = ConWidth_1/2+ConThroatLength_2-(ConThroatLength_2+ConWidth_2/2)*COS(ConAngle_2)-ConLength_2*ConDVecY PARAMETERS ConPosY_2 = ConPosY_2 ConPosZ_2 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_2 = ConPosZ_2 ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_2, ConPosY = ConPosY_2, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_2, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_2, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_2, ConWidth = ConWidth_2, ConDepth = ConDepth_2, ConLength = ConLength_2, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_1, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_2, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_2, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_2, ConToolType = ConToolType_2, ConStatus = ConStatus_2, ConType_2 = ConType_2, ConConnectorType_2 = ConConnectorType_2, ConSystem_2 = ConSystem_2, gs_ui = gs_ui, MEP_bEnableInsulation = 1, MEP_InsShow = MEP_InsShow, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[2][1] = STR(ConToolType_2, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[2][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[2][3] = "0"
! --- 2nd CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 3 ConName = `Патрубок 2`
ConDVecX = COS(ConAngle_3) ConDVecY = -SIN(ConAngle_3) ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = SIN(ConAngle_3) ConWVecY = COS(ConAngle_3) ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(setProgram) THEN VALUES "ConWidth_3" RANGE (ConWidth_1-ConWidth_2, ConWidth_1)
isConLength = 1 IF ABS(gs_AddConnections[3][1] - 1) < EPS THEN isConLength = 0 ConLength_3 = ConWallThickness_1*isConLength PARAMETERS ConLength_3 = ConLength_3 ConPosX_3 = (ConThroatLength_3+ConWidth_3/2)*SIN(ConAngle_3)-ConLength_3*ConDVecX PARAMETERS ConPosX_3 = ConPosX_3 ConPosY_3 = -ConWidth_1/2-ConThroatLength_3+(ConThroatLength_3+ConWidth_3/2)*COS(ConAngle_3)-ConLength_3*ConDVecY PARAMETERS ConPosY_3 = ConPosY_3 ConPosZ_3 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_3 = ConPosZ_3 ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_3, ConPosY = ConPosY_3, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_3, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_3, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_3, ConWidth = ConWidth_3, ConDepth = ConDepth_3, ConLength = ConLength_3, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_3, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_3, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_3, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_3, ConToolType = ConToolType_3, ConStatus = ConStatus_3, ConType_3 = ConType_3, ConConnectorType_3 = ConConnectorType_3, ConSystem_3 = ConSystem_3, gs_ui = gs_ui, MEP_bEnableInsulation = 1, MEP_InsShow = MEP_InsShow, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[3][1] = STR(ConToolType_3, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[3][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[3][3] = "0"
! --- uploading of MEP_NumConnectionData
FOR k = 1 TO MEP_NumberConnections FOR i = 1 TO 9 j = 1+INT((i-0.5)/3) ad = 0 IF i < 4 THEN ad = MEP_Position[1][i] MEP_NumConnectionData[k][i] = outCoords[j+3*(k-1)][i-3*(j-1)]+ad PARAMETERS MEP_NumConnectionData[k][i] = MEP_NumConnectionData[k][i] NEXT i NEXT k
IF setProgram THEN SetProgram = 0 PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram ELSE VALUES "MEP_StraightLength" RANGE[ConWidth_3,]
! ------------------- ! ! --- calculation --- ! ! ------------------- !
length_2 = (ConThroatLength_2+ConWidth_2/2)*(PI/180)*ConAngle_2 length_3 = (ConThroatLength_3+ConWidth_3/2)*(PI/180)*ConAngle_3 gs_list_area = (ConWidth_2 + ConDepth_2)*2*length_2 + (ConWidth_3 + ConDepth_3)*2*length_3 PARAMETERS gs_list_area = gs_list_area ENDIF
!! ! ---------------------- ! !! ! --- object rotator --- ! !! ! ---------------------- ! !! !!connectedA = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][18] !!connectedB = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][18] !!connectedC = MEP_NumConnectionData[3][18] !! !!rot_conn = 0 !!IF ABS(connectedA - 1) < EPS AND ABS(connectedB) < EPS AND ABS(connectedC) < EPS THEN rot_conn = 1 !! !!PARAMETERS rot_conn = rot_conn !! !!IF rot_conn < EPS THEN LOCK "Rotation" !! !!IF rot_conn THEN !! CALL "MEP_m_object_rotator" PARAMETERS rot_conn = rot_conn, !! MEP_Position = MEP_Position, !! Rotation = Rotation, !! gs_Connections = gs_Connections, !! MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, !! MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, !! MEP_NumConnectedConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectedConnectionData, !! defaultMatrix = defaultMatrix !!ENDIF
Symbol.Comment: Разделитель трубопровода с дополнительными изоляцией и фланцем.
